Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP4.model

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP4.model.GameState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable<Request>
public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable<Request>
Contains information about the game being played, its state and its board. It is a singleton.
